content:
When we allow multiple upload banners, how do we want to handle having this many files uploaded at once?

Kapture-2023-04-04-at-20.28.24.mp4

possible options:

  1. Allow as many as they drag in (uppy will eventually rate limit) and if they go off screen then we add a scrollbar to scroll through the current banners. A second big scrollbar on the page might look weird though.
  2. Limit to some number of banners and show an error if there are more than that. If we do this, it might be hard to pick a number because the screen can be all sorts of heights.

Any other ideas?
In the new compose box there is max height for banners after which they start being scrollable. I guess there is a hard limit anyway like 100 or 1000
